org.activiti.explorer.ui.content

接口 AttachmentRenderer

  • 所有超级接口:
    Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    EmailAttachmentRenderer, GenericAttachmentRenderer, ImageAttachmentRenderer, PdfAttachmentRenderer, UrlAttachmentRenderer

    public interface AttachmentRenderer
extends Serializable
    Representing a class that is capable of rendering related content (Attachments) for a certain type in different contexts: overview link, edit/add and detail.
    作者:
    Frederik Heremans

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean canRenderAttachment(String type)
      Returns true if this renderer is capable of rendering attachments of the given type.
      com.vaadin.ui.Component getDetailComponent(Attachment attachment)
      Get the component to render when viewing the details of the related content for the type this renderer is responsible for.
      com.vaadin.terminal.Resource getImage(Attachment attachment)
      Get the image to display in the list of related content for the given attachment.
      String getName(I18nManager i18nManager)
      Gets the human-readable name for the type of related content this class is capable of rendering.
      com.vaadin.ui.Component getOverviewComponent(Attachment attachment, RelatedContentComponent parent)
      Get the component that is used in the related content overview list.

    • 方法详细资料

      • canRenderAttachment

        boolean canRenderAttachment(String type)
        Returns true if this renderer is capable of rendering attachments of the given type.

      • getName

        String getName(I18nManager i18nManager)
        Gets the human-readable name for the type of related content this class is capable of rendering.

      • getImage

        com.vaadin.terminal.Resource getImage(Attachment attachment)
        Get the image to display in the list of related content for the given attachment.
        参数:
        attachment - the attachment to get the image for. When null is passed, the image for a new attachment (of the type this class is capable of rendering) is expected to be returned.

      • getOverviewComponent

        com.vaadin.ui.Component getOverviewComponent(Attachment attachment,
                                             RelatedContentComponent parent)
        Get the component that is used in the related content overview list. Use the passed parent for calling back to show detail.

      • getDetailComponent

        com.vaadin.ui.Component getDetailComponent(Attachment attachment)
        Get the component to render when viewing the details of the related content for the type this renderer is responsible for.
